en.title: FE on Nation Channel TV, Thailand!
en.content: Congratulations to KS Lee, Dr. Siva, Jean Daniels, KC Phoon, Rachel Thomas, Jankij on being featured by Thai TV personality Don Chan on Nation Channel TV, Thailand!
